Name: Gin Fix
Ingredients: 15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Goblet glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon slice wheel.
STRAIN into glass filled with crushed ice.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: A Gin Sour served over crushed ice in a goblet.
History: The fix is an old classic that's very similar to the Daisy.
Nutrition: One serving of Gin Fix contains 185 calories
